variation_responses.I'm curious about the tallest mountain o:
The tallest mountain on Earth is Mount Everest, which stands at a majestic height of 8,848.86 meters (29,031.7 feet) above sea level. It is situated in the Mahalangur Himal sub-range of the Himalayas, on the border between Nepal and China (Tibet Autonomous Region).

Mount Everest is famously known for being the highest point on the planet and a major attraction for mountaineers and adventurers. It was first successfully summited by Sir Edmund Hillary of New Zealand and Tenzing Norgay Sherpa of Nepal on May 29, 1953. Since then, countless climbers have aspired to reach the summit, making it one of the most sought-after achievements in mountaineering.
